    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        private void initialize()

      • setLoginButtonEvent

        private void setLoginButtonEvent()
        Handles actions once login button is pressed. Grabs username and password input, runs them through InputValidation.checkLoginInputs(String username, String password) and if inputs are fine, attempts to authenticate user via authenticateUser(String username, String password)

      • authenticateUser

        private boolean authenticateUser​(java.lang.String usernameInput,
                                 java.lang.String passwordInput)
        Grabs user login inputs, gets row with user info if found, verifies password against provided password, generates error alerts if authentication failed due to incorrect login information or a database connection error, and logs all successful or unsuccessful attempts
        Parameters:
        usernameInput - grabbed from username text field
        passwordInput - grabbed from password text field
        Returns:
        returns true if authentication successful via database call with above inputs
